catalogue.message: The version of the loaded PDF is {inputDocVersion}. This doesn't match the document version {outDocVersion} and could lead to errors.
PDF to be embedded must not be encrypted!
PDF/A mode is active. Embedding a PDF file may result in a non-compliant file!
PDF/X mode is active. Embedding a PDF file may result in a non-compliant file!
Merged font {fontName} has no data for glyph index {index}.
Merged font {fontName} has glyph index {index} duplicated in the char map.
Glyph index {index} is invalid for merged font {fontName}.
Characters {char1} and {char2} sharing the same glyph index {index} for merged font {fontName}.
